front.title: Nuclear power plants - Instrumentation and control important to safety - Electrical equipment condition monitoring methods - Part 1: General
front.abstract: This part of IEC/IEEE 62582 is the first part of the IEC/IEEE 62582 series of standards, containing background and guidelines for the application of methods for condition monitoring of electrical equipment important to safety of nuclear power plants. The detailed descriptions of the methods are given in the other parts, one part for each method. This part also includes some elements which are common to all methods.
